thread.title: Burma’s Yet Incomplete Democratic Transition
thread.title_full: Burma’s Yet Incomplete Democratic Transition - WSJ

author: Jan Figel
title: Burma’s Yet Incomplete Democratic Transition
text:
The United Nations on Friday issued a report on the Burmese military’s abuse of Rohingya Muslim civilians in northern Rakhine State over the past four months. The campaign of murders, mass gang-rapes, brutal beatings and disappearances clearly rises to the level of crimes against humanity.
The report draws on interviews with 204 Rohingyas who fled to Bangladesh, most of whom witnessed killings. Almost half reported having a family member killed. Of the 101 women interviewed by U.N. investigators, more than half said they...
